title: Changes to Kilmore Town Service (Link Bus)
articleContent:
Changes to Kilmore Town Service (Link Bus)

From Monday 24 April 2023, the 11:37am weekday service from Kilmore East Station to Kilmore will change to depart 7 minutes later at 11:44am. Subsequent stops along this service will also be affected. 

This change will allow rail passengers arriving at Kilmore East Station to connect with the bus service to Kilmore.

To plan your journey, view the new Kilmore Town Service timetable, visit Journey planner, or call 1800 800 007 to order a printed copy of your timetable.
articleDescription: We’re proposing changes to bus routes 631 and 821.
